title: PrintMoney
description: A comprehensive SaaS template designed to accelerate MVP development. Built with Next.js, featuring PostgreSQL (Neon), Drizzle ORM, Better-Auth for authentication, PostHog for analytics, Sentry for error tracking, and Stripe for payment processing.

title: OneStopMarketing
description: An AI-powered UGC ad creation platform that enables users to generate and edit videos directly in the browser. Features include AI avatar creation, in-browser video editing with Remotion, and automated social media scheduling across multiple platforms.

title: Downtominutes
description: A sophisticated goal-tracking application that helps users break down ambitious objectives into manageable steps. Features systematic planning tools and progress tracking to ensure consistent achievement of personal and professional goals.

title: InvoiceManager
description: An intelligent invoice management system that streamlines payment tracking and client communication. Features include automated payment reminders, customizable email templates via Resend, and comprehensive invoice tracking with expected payment dates.
